name: eslint-plugin-kodekonveyor
description: rules of the Kode Konveyor typescript implementation pattern
author: Kode konveyor OÃœ

scripts.qa: npm run build && npm run lint && runContracts
scripts.publish:patch: npm run qa && npm version patch && git push origin develop --tags && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm run qa && npm version minor && git push origin develop --tags && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: npm run qa && npm version major && git push origin develop --tags && npm publish
